name: Multi-Dimensional Chameleon
description:
A short puzzle platformer about a dimension hopping chameleon, made by Felix Redmond and Adrian Marquez Montoya for the 2021 GMTK GameJam.

This is our second game jam game, so we know its not very good, but thank you for playing anyways.

Also, I know the title screen is misspelled, by the time I caught that, I couldn't go back and change it :(
